_header: Melchiades [Miltiades] the pope in Africa I-bore was
Subjects: Melchiades [Miltiades], pope, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of Pope Miltiades, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Melchiades þe pope in affer I bore wasof swyþe
                    good cristin kende so god gaf þe cas…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we god almyȝty king þat after oure
                    endingto þe ioy þat lesteþ euer oure soules þedir
                    bring
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 405-7.
